page.title: 03PERTON VILLAGE
page.content: Perton Village is a popular place to settle in for new couples and families. Here builders have constructed many new houses for families to move into. There are a wide range of different house here built by many building companies. The companies have unfortunately forgotten the children - there is no real Playing Fields, as yet. Before Perton Village existed it was an area of farming land and before that it was a Royal Air Force Airfield. Today it is still surrounded by farmland and areas of picturesque woodland.
